---
title: "Canon"
description: "PTP Canon definitions"
---

# Canon

## CanonAperture

**Code:** `0xd101`

Canon Aperture (f-stop)

**Datatype:** UINT16

---

## CanonShutterSpeed

**Code:** `0xd102`

Canon Shutter Speed

**Datatype:** UINT16

---

## CanonIso

**Code:** `0xd103`

Canon ISO Sensitivity

**Datatype:** UINT16

---

## CanonExpCompensation

**Code:** `0xd104`

Canon Exposure Compensation

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonAutoExposureMode

**Code:** `0xd105`

Canon Auto Exposure Mode

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonDriveMode

**Code:** `0xd106`

Canon Drive Mode

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonMeteringMode

**Code:** `0xd107`

Canon Metering Mode

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonFocusMode

**Code:** `0xd108`

Canon Focus Mode

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonWhiteBalance

**Code:** `0xd109`

Canon White Balance

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonWhiteBalanceAdjustA

**Code:** `0xd10b`

Canon White Balance Adjust A

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonWhiteBalanceAdjustB

**Code:** `0xd10c`

Canon White Balance Adjust B

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonWhiteBalanceXA

**Code:** `0xd10d`

Canon White Balance X A

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonWhiteBalanceXB

**Code:** `0xd10e`

Canon White Balance X B

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonColorSpace

**Code:** `0xd10f`

Canon Color Space

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonPictureStyle

**Code:** `0xd110`

Canon Picture Style

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonAutoPowerOff

**Code:** `0xd114`

Canon Auto Power Off

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonModelId

**Code:** `0xd116`

Canon Model ID

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonAvailableShots

**Code:** `0xd11b`

Canon Available Shots

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonAeModeDial

**Code:** `0xd138`

Canon AE Mode Dial

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonPictureStyleExStandard

**Code:** `0xd157`

Canon Picture Style Ex Standard

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonExposureSimMode

**Code:** `0xd1b7`

Canon Exposure Simulation Mode

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonLiveViewMode

**Code:** `0xd1b0`

Set live view mode.

**Datatype:** UINT16

---

## CanonRecordingDestination

**Code:** `0xd1b8`

Movie recording destination.

**Datatype:** UINT16

---

## CanonLvViewTypeSelect

**Code:** `0xd1bc`

Canon Live View Type Select

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonFlashChargingState

**Code:** `0xd1c0`

Canon Flash Charging State

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonAloMode

**Code:** `0xd1c1`

Canon ALO Mode

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonOneShotRawOn

**Code:** `0xd1c3`

Canon One Shot RAW On

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonBrightness

**Code:** `0xd1d5`

Canon Brightness

**Datatype:** 4

---

## CanonAeb

**Code:** `0xd1d9`

Canon Auto Exposure Bracketing

**Datatype:** 4
